Key Match Events: England won by 4 wickets with 2 balls remaining.
Sam Curran has nine wickets in the tournament with an economy rate of 6.28.
Mark Wood, the fastest bowler of this World Cup so far, has six wickets.
Ben Stokes has four wickets with an economy rate of 5.04.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka looked to spoil England's qualification party.
England have won their last seven T20Is against Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka have no hope of making the semi-finals.
England needed to win to progress to the knockouts.
Bad weather was not forecast for Sydney on the match day.
Sri Lanka have not beaten England since 2014.
Sam Curran, Mark Wood, and Ben Stokes were highlighted for their bowling performances in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The surface was worn, which should suit the spinners.
Sri Lanka's batters have become better at playing legspin recently.
Adil Rashid has nine wickets against Sri Lanka in seven matches with an economy rate of 5.91.
Lahiru Kumara has five wickets from five matches in the tournament.
